name: The Legendary Swordmaster: Only I Have the Power to Forge Swords from Monsters
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManga
content: What kind of magic sword will you become…?” The protagonist, Touji Nanase, who was constantly harassed by debt collectors and bullied by his boss at a toxic job, gets sucked into a dungeon that suddenly appears and is attacked by monsters! As he teeters on the brink of death, he gains a legendary item and awakens a cheat skill called “Magic Swordsman,” allowing him to transform defeated monsters into swords.
